thread.title: ‘Regardless of your politics’ you’ll LOL watching Melissa McCarthy as Sean Spicer on SNL [video]
thread.title_full: ‘Regardless of your politics’ you’ll LOL watching Melissa McCarthy as Sean Spicer on SNL [video]

author: Sam J.
title: ‘Regardless of your politics’ you’ll LOL watching Melissa McCarthy as Sean Spicer on SNL [video]
text:
‘Regardless of your politics’ you’ll LOL watching Melissa McCarthy as Sean Spicer on SNL [video] Posted at 9:13 am on February 5, 2017 by Sam J. Share on Facebook Share on Twitter 
We’d like to think that even Sean Spicer himself would find Melissa McCarthy’s portrayal of him hilarious. Let’s be honest, if they’re making fun of you at THIS level you’re making noise which is exactly what Spicer has wanted to do from the get go. 
Watch and laugh: Melissa McCarthy Plays Sean Spicer Going Nuts on the Press in Hilarious #SNL Sketch: 'APOLOGIZE TO ME!' https://t.co/CdFIdnmDA1 (VIDEO) pic.twitter.com/NNYxSSJMCG 
Her performance is fairly amazing. And sure, there will be people who get ticked off over this but we’re hoping the majority find it as funny as we do. Remember the rules … then they laugh at you. I haven’t laughed this hard at an SNL segment in years. 
Regardless your politics, watch this: https://t.co/fY4pCvDGxK 
— Frank Luntz (@FrankLuntz) February 5, 2017 Trending
